sys_script_include.name: Reviewer_hasrole

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_9c8db37e47bb211008c85088c26d43d5
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_976837_warrant_0.Reviewer_hasrole</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>Reviewer_hasrole</name><script><![CDATA[var Reviewer_hasrole = Class.create();
Reviewer_hasrole.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
  reviewer: function() {
        roles = '';
        var hasrole = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role');
        hasrole.addQuery('role', '188bf91a4773211008c85088c26d430a');
        hasrole.query();
        while (hasrole.next()) {
//             gs.addInfoMessage(hasrole.role.getDisplayValue());
//             gs.addInfoMessage(hasrole.user.getDisplayValue());
            var user_sysid = hasrole.user;
            var users = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
            users.addQuery('sys_id', user_sysid);
            users.query();
            while (users.next()) {
                roles += ',' + users.sys_id;
            }
        }
        return 'sys_idIN' + roles;
    },
    type: 'Reviewer_hasrole'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-07 05:32:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>9c8db37e47bb211008c85088c26d43d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reviewer_hasrole</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Warranty Claims" source="x_976837_warrant_0">488bf91a4773211008c85088c26d4304</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Warranty Claims">488bf91a4773211008c85088c26d4304</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9c8db37e47bb211008c85088c26d43d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 12:14:34</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
